documentation.title: Zazzle Create-A-Product API Guide v3
documentation.overview: Unlock and monetize content by adding images/text to Zazzle products via URL linkovers.

implementation_modes.one_to_one: Generate a single product with one link (Template Link).
implementation_modes.one_to_many: Generate multiple products with one link (Templates Buffet).

workflow_steps.note: Cannot use default 'New Products' category; create specific category (e.g., 'My Templates').

process: Configure Object Properties: Product Page Label, URL Parameter Name, Inner fit/fill (images), Allow editing.
Set Store Category (must match Step 3 for 1-to-Many).

workflow_steps.detail: Place links in website or app.

api_specifications.encoding_requirement: All dynamic image URLs and text values must be URL Encoded.

key_differences.max_dim: Output size in pixels (10-2212); >699 includes Zazzle branding.

fixes: Wait 24 hours for new category population.
Ensure category is not default 'New Products'.

best_practices.editing: Templates cannot be edited after posting; create new product and delete old.
best_practices.naming: Use consistent URL Parameter Names across templates for 1-to-Many (e.g., 'logo' for all).
best_practices.visibility: Templates must be 'Public' and 'G-Rated' for Templates Buffet.
best_practices.images: Match placeholder aspect ratio to source images.

default_naming_convention.rule: If the user does not manually rename the object in the Zazzle Template editor, the API defaults to incrementing integers.
default_naming_convention.implication: The AI Agent must confirm the exact parameter name used in the specific Zazzle Template before generating bulk URLs.

image_behavior.fit_mode: Image acts as bounding box. No cropping. Safest for irregular logos.
image_behavior.fill_mode: Image fills the box. Cropping occurs if aspect ratio differs. Best for full-bleed background textures or photos.
image_behavior.source_requirement: All image URLs (t_image1_iid) must be hosted on a domain explicitly declared in the Zazzle Associate Settings.

url_structure_nuance.realview_vs_linkover_param: CRITICAL: RealView uses 't_image1_url'. Product Linkover uses 't_image1_iid'. Do not mix them.
